entry.title: Maritime Hostile Takeover

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,500Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 69

Summary: The colony of seals didnâ€™t usually bother Hal whenever he was working, so he paid them no mind unless he was trying to get one to move out his way.How was he supposed to know that finding one of their pelts would trigger a whole-ass situation he was totally unqualified to deal with.
